Different Crime.Crime Name: Making false statements to immigration authorities
humanitarian_and_compassionate_factors: H&C application filed after learning of imminent removal
best_interests_of_children: Consideration of children's best interests in H&C application
decision_outcome: Motion for staying the removal order dismissed
evidence_assessment: Claims of irreparable harm found speculative and lacking concrete evidence
legal_basis: Section 48 of the Immigration Act mandates execution of removal orders
